text: The game's standard battle theme, I'm not sure we should even call them "enemies". Listening to this is enough for me to visualize the tons of humoristic battle options you have and texts the opponents say. That's why Undertale is such a memorable game, you would think you'd associate this with killing tons of enemies and grinding for Exp. Toby Fox created such a success with this that he'll probably have trouble making a second game that meets the tremendous expectations.
